Cordova.exec: fn(success: fn(), fail: fn(), service: string, action: string, args?: [string])
Cordova.define: fn(moduleName: string, factory: fn(require: ?, exports: ?, module: ?))

Document.addEventListener: fn(type: string, listener: fn(ev: Event), useCapture?: bool)
Document.removeEventListener: fn(type: string, listener: fn(ev: Event), useCapture?: bool)

ArgsCheck.checkArgs: fn(argsSpec: string, functionName: string, args: [?], callee?: ?)
